com.ociweb.pronghorn.pipe

Class ChannelWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • com.ociweb.pronghorn.pipe.ChannelWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppendableByteWriter<ChannelWriter>, ByteConsumer, ByteWriter, PHAppendable<ChannelWriter>, Closeable, DataOutput, Flushable, ObjectOutput, Appendable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataOutputBlobWriter

    public abstract class ChannelWriter
extends OutputStream
implements ObjectOutput, Appendable, ByteConsumer, AppendableByteWriter<ChannelWriter>
